description.narrative: 1. Access to quality food ingredient: By supporting a quality-focused NDC producer, IFC will help Jiahe to set an example for the rest of the sector, and raise the country's overall food safety standards; consumers will benefit from having access to safe and affordable alternative to milk in processed food and beverages. 2. Direct Job creation: The Project is expected to create about 250 direct jobs. The use of quality ingredients by hundreds of SMEs (bakeries and other food companies) will help strengthen their operations and market position.

Suzhou Jiahe Foods Industry Co Ltd. (Jiahe or the Company) is Chinas leading manufacturer of non-dairy creamer (NDC) a key ingredient in packaged beverages, fresh bakery products and processed food. The Company is planning to invest to: (i) upgrade its NDC production lines for capacity expansion; (ii) construct a new R&D center; (iii) set up a beverage mixture production line; (iv) build a freeze-dry coffee facility and (iii) add a modern warehouse (together, the Project).

participating-org.narrative: Suzhou Jiahe Foods Industry Co., Ltd.
